relationships.description: Harry and Cho have a conversation about Dungbombs in the Owlery.
Harry is concerned that he might be suspected of ordering Dungbombs.
Cho is also concerned about why the caretaker thought Harry was ordering Dungbombs.
Mrs. Norris follows the caretaker down the stairs.
